p: The Peppol Directory specification is newer than the Peppol SMP specification and therefore not all SMPs support Peppol Directory. This page contains all known SMP implementations that are known to support the Peppol Directory specification.
Since October 3rd 2019 all Peppol SMP providers MUST be able to support the Peppol Directory interface from their SMPs. Specification v1.1 is the latest one.
